tossup_question: 26) PHYSICS  Which of the following is TRUE of a sound wave traveling in dry air (at standard temperature and pressure) at a constant velocity:
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) if frequency increases, wavelength increases
X) if frequency increases, wavelength decreases
Y) if frequency decreases, wavelength decreases
Z) if frequency increases, wavelength stays the same
tossup_answer: ANSWER: X) if frequency increases, wavelength decreases
bonus_question: 26) PHYSICS  Through what two particles is most of the energy released by a star like our Sun?
